title: Episode #4. A Look At The Cases Through An Attorney's Eyes
description:
Former D.A. John Snyder answers questions many had about how the boating accident was handled, the Murdaugh family’s law practice, and more. #murdaugh #truecrime #law #murdaughmurders #mallorybeach
